title: Gears of War: Judgment
description: The Games on the Demand version supports English, French, Spanish, Chinese, Korean, Japanese, Polish, and Czech. Download the manual for this game by locating the game on http://marketplace.xbox.com and selecting “See Game Manual".  In the immediate aftermath of Emergence Day, the fate of the world rests on the shoulders of young COG lieutenant Damon Baird and his team - Kilo Squad. As the world of Sera is destroyed around them, Kilo must rise up, break the rules and take the fight to a horrifying new enemy in this blockbuster prequel to one of the most celebrated franchises in gaming history.

contentRating.label: M (Mature)
disclaimers: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB

childDownloads.title: Gears of War Judgment Alex Brand Multiplayer Character
childDownloads.description: Popular Gears of War comic book heroine Alex Brand--playable here for the first time ever--is a tough-as-nails COG Sergeant who fought many battles against the Locust as a member of Foxtrot.  Despite Alex’s fierce demeanor, she is extremely loyal to her fellow COG and will do anything to protect them.  This exclusive Alex Brand Multiplayer Skin will let you play as Alex in competitive multiplayer matches in Gears of War: Judgment

childDownloads.title: Animated Armor Skin Pack
childDownloads.description: This collection includes all of the purchasable, animated armor skins in Gears of War: Judgment at a discount! Does not contain skins exclusive to VIP Season Pass.

childDownloads.title: Animated Weapon Skin Pack
childDownloads.description: This collection includes all of the purchasable, animated weapon skins in Gears of War: Judgment at a discount! Does not contain skins exclusive to VIP Season Pass.

childDownloads.title: Gears of War Judgment Anya Stroud Multiplayer Character
childDownloads.description: Fan favorite character Anya Stroud began as a communication officer in the COG army.  When the Lambent broke loose on the surface during Gears of War 3, Anya stepped up to the frontlines to fight alongside other Delta members to save the world. This exclusive Anya Stroud Multiplayer Skin will let you play as Anya in competitive multiplayer matches in Gears of War: Judgment

childDownloads.title: Baird's Goggles
childDownloads.description: Equip your avatar with these iconic goggles as worn by Baird in the Gears of War games.

childDownloads.title: Call to Arms DLC Pack
childDownloads.description: Do not purchase if you’re a VIP pass holder, instead you will be prompted for this download in-game.  Stand your ground with new multiplayer maps “Blood Drive,” “Boneyard” and  “Terminal” (OverRun).  Additionally, the new exclusive game mode, “Master at Arms” will test the true range of your soldiering skills.

childDownloads.title: Chicks dig the Baird T-Shirt
childDownloads.description: Don the  infamous Chicks dig the Baird T-Shirt!

childDownloads.title: Chicks dig the Baird T-Shirt
childDownloads.description: Don the infamous Chicks dig the Baird T-Shirt!

childDownloads.title: Double Rainbow Armor Skin
childDownloads.description: Double Rainbow themed animated armor skin

childDownloads.title: Double Rainbow Weapon Skin
childDownloads.description: Double Rainbow themed animated weapon skin

childDownloads.title: Dreadnought DLC Pack
childDownloads.description: Do not purchase if you’re a VIP pass holder, instead you will be prompted for this download in-game.  Welcome to Dreadnought, an all-new map for OverRun set aboard the remains of the grounded COG Naval Vessel, Pomeroy. This download is brought to you by MAXIM!

childDownloads.title: Gears of War Judgment Emergence Era Dom Multiplayer Character
childDownloads.description: Best friend of Marcus Fenix and a cherished hero of Delta Squad, Dominic “Dom” Santiago made a pivotal sacrifice in the war against the Locust horde and will be forever remembered for his bravery. With this character skin, you can play as Dom as he was at the time of Emergence Day, six weeks after his role in the brutal Pendulum Wars had come to an end. This exclusive character skin is for use in competitive multiplayer matches in Gears of War: Judgment

childDownloads.title: Gears of War Judgment Emergence Era Marcus Multiplayer Character
childDownloads.description: Decorated war hero Marcus Fenix is the legendary leader of Delta Squad.  This exclusive character skin takes Marcus back in time, six weeks after the end of the Pendulum Wars, and during the chaos of Emergence Day--a time before he was hardened by his long imprisonment. This exclusive character skin is for use in competitive multiplayer matches in Gears of War: Judgment

childDownloads.title: Epic Armor Skin Pack
childDownloads.description: Every purchasable armor skin, both static and new animated skins, have been included in this ultimate armor skin package. Does not contain skins exclusive to VIP Season Pass.
